Test Description: Testing basic game understanding and rule understanding.
Question: How many completed cities are present in the given landscape, before placing any option tiles (A, B, C)?
Rationale: By examining the landscape, we can identify the completed cities. There are 4 completed cities in the landscape: one at [(2,1), (2,2), (3,2)], one at [(3,2), (3,3)], one at [(2,4), (2,5), (3,5), (4,5)] and one at [(5,3), (6,1), (6,2), (6,3), (7,1), (7,2), (7,3)]. Therefore, the total number of completed cities in the given landscape is 4.
